attributes.action: Make the use of barb less hooks compulsory for coarse fishing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of barbed hooks for coarse fishing causes unnecessary suffering to fish, sometimes even resulting in the loss of most of the lip tissue, following repeated catching of the same fish in small lakes and waters.
The fish can also swallow the hooks, causing internal injury and sometimes death, when the barbed hook is removed.
Wildlife also suffer from discarded fishing hooks and line, they would find it easier to free themselves if the hooks were barb less.
Barb less hooks are readily available from fishing tackle shops
